Nov. 11, 1901 D Douglas (Isle of Man) Contest
Douglas (Isle of Man) Contest 0 Other
douglas-isle-of-man-contest
None
Test Piece Contest
Songs of Shakespeare
Douglas, Isle of Man March contest - 1st Metropolitan, 2nd Douglas Volunteers, 3rd Crosby. Best soprano, cornet and euphonium - Metropolitan. Best trombone - Douglas Town. 4 bands competed.
Oct. 23, 2013, 9:24 a.m. June 29, 2018, 6:59 a.m.
1 Castletown Metropolitan Silver Band Henry Bentley
2 Douglas Volunteers F. C. Poulter
3 Douglas Town Band George Thornley
4 Crosby Diamond Jubilee J. W. Scott
